features: PORTABLE: This 3-burner portable camping stove comes with a carry handle that allows you to carry it conveniently. It has a compact structure and weights only 10lbs which makes it even easier to carry it around. It can be taken along in a luggage or storage box, or even large tote bag, so carrying this portable propane camping stove is a breeze thing to do! Size: 23.4”x12.8”x3.4", Weight:9.9 LB

ADJUSTABLE 3 BURNERS : This camping gas stove is equipped with 3 independently adjustable knobs, two of Piezo ignition burners with 6,600 BTU power. The middle downward burner is designed for toasting, 7200BTU power and requires manual ignition. We recommend that you use a piezo lighter. It relies on heat radiation to heat and won't burn the toast

EASY TO CLEAN: Our portable propane stove comes with a drip tray that makes it easy for quick clean up. You won’t be bothered by stains on tables or clothes. All you need to do after cooking is to remove the tray and wipe it until it looks clean again, and put it back to the camping stove case

EASY INSTALLATION & USE: No need to buy hose connector or other accessories, it’s ready to be used after connecting to a 16 oz propane tank. Or you can buy a propane hose connector if the propane tank is over 16oz. The camping cooking stove has a windshield fixing clip which helps you to continue cooking if the weather becomes windy suddenly or facing other unfavorable weathers

SUITABLE FOR DIFFERENT OCCASIONS: This outdoor stove is suitable for various scenarios, such as camping, BBQ, party, family emergency backup...It can be managed easily and provide steady cooking performance as it holds true even in different environment

NOTICE：Please make sure that the gas will not leak before use. You can test it with soapy water on the connection. If you see bubbles or even hear gas leaks, please don't use it and contact us.And please contact us if you have any quality problems.

This high-quality portable grill is an excellent choice for outdoor activity or BBQ party. Suitable for a variety of cooking methods This portable propane gas stove is equipped with 3 independently adjustable burns. Two of Piezo ignition burners with 6,600 BTU power. The middle downward burner with 7200 BTU power is designed for roasting.
3 Burner 20400 BTU Propane Camping Stove FineFlame Camping Stove Car Camping BBQ Picnics Outdoor Cooking Camping Gas Stove

Easy to clean Our portable propane stove comes with a drip tray that makes it easy for quick clean up Suitable for different pans and pots This outdoor stove is suitable for various scenarios, such as camping, BBQ, party, family emergency backup Downward Burner and Grilling Pan specially design for baking and roasting NOTICE： 1. The burner in the middle needs to be ignited manually, we recommend you to use a piezo lighter. 2. Please check the fuel remaining before using the fuel tank, When the air pressure in the gas tank is insufficient, the flame may be extinguished. When you find that the flame is out, please turn the knob to off in time. Easy installation & use No need to buy hose connector or other accessories, it’s ready to be used after connecting to a 16 oz propane tank. Powerful Burner 3 independently adjustable knobs, two of Piezo ignition burners with 6,600 BTU power. The middle downward burner is designed for toasting, 7200BTU Portable Camping Stove 3-burner portable camping stove comes with a carry handle that allows you to carry it conveniently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for camping
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for camping- easy to assemble, easy to carry, strong flame heats quickly a large pot - impressed! The middle burner is perfect for toasting awesome feature!Slim, not heavy or bulky- you need this if you love camping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking and efficient
reviews.reviewText: Love this cook top which we use as an outdoor appliance when we travel in our RV. Great folding lid. Flame is good and can be adjusted if you're careful. Very sensitive control. Overall, very pleased. Love the toaster feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good stove so far
reviews.reviewText: This stove worked very well, with plenty of space for larger pans. However, becareful with the brass connection for the propane bottle--Mine came slightly bent. (The box was damaged) I was able to bend it carefully, by screwing the connection tube/fitting on it. It passed the soap bubble test. I also had to use plyer to squeeze the locking clamps as they very easily came detached. So there are build quality/packaging issues. Overall, it is an attractive stove, that lights very easily using the ignition. It cooks/heats quickly. The middle (3rd) burner does toast well, though you have to rotate the bread as you go. It's still a better option than the traditional stove top tool for toasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well, durable, and perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great piece of kit for the price
reviews.reviewText: I carry it in my semi and have cooked steak dinners on it complete with potatoes, gravy and veg. Stores easily in the truck and with a couple of pots and pans you're all set to cook whatever you want. Sure beats the hell out of eating the junk and road kill they serve at the truck stops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sorry, it's good, but not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: It works, but it does not appear to be very durable. The right burner was bent when I first got it. I'd say if you use this, don't move it around too much. The controls are difficult to operate and sticky. The "toasting" feature underneath is basically unusable. Unable to support heavy cookware such as cast-iron. You would have to use lightweight aluminum to cook on it or it might crush it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Get stove for camping. When I lit the middle burner it warped and still is warped. As far as the other eyes, they worked great. Easy to adjust the flame from high to low. I saved a lot of propane with this stove. My teenagers use it with ease since it lights without matches. Could use some wind sheild/guards.
